channel.title: Paintball
channel.description: Didnt know if you can only talk about computer games or not but mods can lock/delete if they want! :) well just hoping we could talk about techniques... game types (woodsball, speedball, sceanarios)... what kind of marker you have feel free but if you have an angel and someone else has a blade or something plz dont pick on them some people just arent as lucky :) so have fun!!

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

Just bought a Diablo Wrath myself, has a delrin bolt and ram. A SP on/off. The air system is Fux0red so it went in for repairs.

Read full topic

@mjordan wrote:

i have a spyder electric. and i like speedball the best but woodsball is fun sometimes

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @shawrty shawrty
item.description:
@shawrty wrote:

ok so compressed i guess im gonna use my compressed air tank so what guns do you guys have

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

HPA is where you want to be. C02 is hell on your guns internals. Except for a few guns that can handle it. Iv’e shot a Diablo Wrath with CO2, very very nice. I shot an Ion wit Co2, thats another story…

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Compressed air is better overall.

Except, depending on what kind of day it is. C02 can have it’s benefits.
If you get a good amount of liquid C02, it’ll last you a lot longer than a 3-4.5k compressed air tank will.

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @shawrty shawrty
item.description:
@shawrty wrote:

lol very true i like both of them speed ball is funner gets the adrealine pumping and woods ball i get a little bored sometimes not enough action but it all depends on my mood… and i got a question for my ion should i use my compressed air or my CO2 Anti-Syphons??

Read full topic

item.title: Paintball
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

Man i hate woods. One of my friends is like: “Speedball take no skill all you have to do is shoot alot.” To which i replied: “I’d like to see you get your sorry ass into the snake when your being shot at by 3 bunkers…”

Read full topic

i dont have an angel lol i think that they are to much for a paintball marker instead i have a smartparts ion at the moment and i love it… my first gun was a spyder Xtra

Speedball is fun, but woodsball ftw.
